Generated Narrative: ValueSet medication-example-uv-ips

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    777067000Acetaminophen only product
    774587000Amoxicillin and clavulanic acid only product
    776556004Lithium citrate only product
    774409003Acenocoumarol only product
    780130002Acetaminophen only product in rectal dose form
    778315007Amoxicillin and clavulanic acid only product in oral dose form
    779725005Lithium citrate only product in oral dose form
    778207007Acenocoumarol only product in oral dose form
    322257001Paracetamol 250 mg rectal suppository
    392259005Amoxicillin 875 mg and clavulanic acid (as clavulanate potassium) 125 mg oral tablet
    766489003Lithium citrate 104 mg/mL oral solution
    319740004Acenocoumarol 1 mg oral tablet
  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    CodeDisplay
    331055Amoxicillin 1000 MG
    437158Acetaminophen 100 MG
    332122lithium citrate 60 MG/ML
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc
    CodeDisplay
    0781-1852Amoxicillin and Clavulanate Potassium (product)
    0781-1852-20Amoxicillin and Clavulanate Potassium, 20 TABLET, FILM COATED in 1 BOTTLE (0781-1852-20) (package)

name: MedicationsExampleUvIps
title: Medications - example (IPS)
description: This value set provides an example of possible medication coded concepts. This value set will be removed in a future release and has been replaced with [medication-uv-ips](./ValueSet-medication-uv-ips.html).
